str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Middle or Passive - 2nd Person Singular
str2: From para and the middle voice of aiteo; to beg off, i.e. Deprecate, decline, shun.
Probably from the base of musterion; dull or stupid, i.e. Heedless, blockhead, absurd.
Untrained, uneducated, showing a want of training or education, ignorant. Uninstructed, i.e. stupid.
A question, debate, controversy; a seeking, search. From zeteo; a searching, i.e. A dispute or its theme.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular

str2: Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From a variation of genos; to procreate; figuratively, to regenerate.
From machomai; a battle, i.e. controversy.
